name: Blood Spear (2021)
description:
Graduation Video Game
School : ISART DIGITAL, the Video Game and 3D Animation / VFX School

The Blood Spear has awaken and it wants blood. A lot of blood. Throw to impale and kill from afar, defeat powerful foes to absorb their lifeblood. Progress through grandiose environments and carry out your gruesome vengeance in this epic third-person action adventure.

Platform: PC
Engine: Unreal
Number of players: 1
Genre: Action/Adventure

PEGI 16

Game & Level Designer - VFX Artist: Clément DESCHAMPS
Game Designer - Boss Scripter & Designer: Louis LANGLET
3D Enviro/Props Artist: Quentin LE GOFF
